description:
When Kaneamari shows Akubi a smartphone video of the famous dog trainer he plans on hiring to train his bulldog, Akubi’s excitement soars. Before Kan knows it, he is donning a collar and having his furry derriere sniffed by a very stubborn bulldog.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kan-chan, Inu ni Naru! no Hanashi
カンちゃん, 犬になる! の話
